content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:betterfootnotes]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-animation]]

[[module css]]

.top-left-box > .item {
  display: none;
}

.class_memo {
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    width: 85%;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    padding: 10px 20px 20px 20px;
    word-break: break-word;
}

#page-content .anom-bar-container.multiple .text-part .disrupt-class::before {
content: "E" !important;
}

#page-content .anom-bar-container.multiple .text-part .risk-class::before {
content: "E" !important;
}

[[/module]]

[[div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:customizable-acs
|disruption-class= multiple
|disruption-image= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7376/Multiple.svg
|disruption-color= 66,66,72
|inc-disruption= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:customizable-acs
|risk-class= multiple
|risk-image= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7376/Multiple.svg
|risk-color= 66,66,72
|inc-risk= --]]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source
|item-number= SCP-7376
|clearance= 4
|container-class= esoteric
|secondary-class= multiplex
|secondary-icon= https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7376/Multiplex.svg
|disruption-class= multiple
|risk-class= multiple
]]

[[module css]]
.anom-bar-container.esoteric .danger-diamond > .quadrants > .bottom-quad {
    background-color:rgba(66,66,72,0.25);
    background-color: rgb(66,66,72,0.25);
[[/module]]

[[/div]]

----

[[include component:image-block
| name=Omega7.png
| caption=Only known photo of the American Secure Containment Initiative's Omega-7 facility.
| width=100%
| align=center]]

@@ @@

[[div class="class_memo"]]
[[div style="background: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/scp-7376/ClassificationCommittee.png") center no-repeat;"]]

[[=]]

++++ CLASSIFICATION COMMITTEE MEMORANDUM

[[/=]]

----

A Multiplex-class anomaly is a group of two or more discrete anomalies that are inextricably linked, to such a degree that describing them separately is either inadvisable or impossible.

When reviewing the database file of a Multiplex-class anomaly, please take care to __read all available sections completely__. Failure to do so may result in disciplinary action.

[[>]]
--Dir. Jean Karlyle Aktus, USINBL Site-81
[[/>]]

[[/div]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[=]]

[[size large]][[collapsible show="ACCESS SECTION 7376-A" hide="SECTION 7376-A IS CURRENTLY BEING EDITED. TRY AGAIN LATER."]][[/size]]

@@ @@

[[/=]]
author: MontagueETC
